titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Description for the Donald Levine, Papers and Addenda1950s-2015
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by APT, 2020

did.head: Descriptive Summary

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Donald Levine was a professor of Sociology at the University of Chicago from 1962 to 2015. This collection contains records from his time as a professor and administrator.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research, but access is restricted to portions containing administrative, financial, personnel, and student evaluative records. Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Donald Levine, Papers., Box #, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

did.unittitle: This collection has not been organized.Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information about this collection.
